record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 106
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 106 -- (House of Representatives - October 04, 2007)

[Page: H11298]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H. Res. 106.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Illinois?
